reviews.text: Wow! What a gem in Medford! I lived down the street for months and had no idea this amazing place was even there!
reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!

reviews.text: Attended a wedding at UTGT and stayed the night in one of the five rooms.
reviews.title: lovely and quaint little spot

reviews.text: Check out the pictures to really see how beautiful the property is. I did not make the reservations or anything, but our experiences there were incomparable.
reviews.title: Great Place!

reviews.text: Have you ever seen a Maxfield Parrish painting? The oak leaves sillouetted against the deep blue sky with orange clouds in background? My boyfriend and I were treated to this scene while sipping wine in the gardens of Under The Greenwood Tree. Could have been a fluke but I think evenings like this are many at this charming spot.
reviews.title: Expected better for the price
